Package ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.http.api.request.form

Class FormBuilder

java.lang.Object
ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.http.api.request.form.FormBuilder
public abstract class FormBuilder extends Object
This is the abstract class that is designed to support the building of query parts/application/x-www-form-urlencoded-bodies of http requests.

  • Method Details

    • addParameter

      protected void addParameter​(String name, boolean toExpand, FormValueDelimiters delimiter, boolean allowReserved, Object... values)
      Adds a form parameter.
      Parameters:
      name - is a name of a form parameter
      toExpand - to expand parameter value or not. It has an effect when value is an array or Iterable of length that greater than 1
      delimiter - is a delimiter of array/iterable value
      allowReserved - allows to use reserved character not encoded or not
      values - values of the defined parameter

    • addParameter

      protected void addParameter​(String name, Object value)
      Adds a form parameter.
      Parameters:
      name - is a name of a form parameter
      value - is a value to set with no encoding

    • buildForm

      protected String buildForm()
      Returns:
      build form for further usage
